renderpass.code:
void mainImage(out vec4 o, vec2 i)
{
float d = 8192.,\
      e = exp(-mod(iTime, log(2.)));\
o.xy = i * e;\
for(o.x = .5 * (o.x-o.y); e < d; o = mod(o, d *= .5))\
	d < o.x + o.y ? d--, o-=o : o;\
o++;}
